name: Shaymin Land
description: The Gratitude Pokémon. It lives in flower patches and avoids detection by curling up to look like a flowering plant.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokémon is cured of negative status ailments upon returning to its Pokeball.

abilities.name: Form Change
abilities.description: Shaymin's default form is Land. When Given a Gracidea Flower to hold, it can change to Sky Form, taking on new typing, statistics, and moves
